description: Core FABER workflow primitives - issue management, branching, PR lifecycle. Meant to be extended by other workflows.

frame.description: Fetch work item and setup branch

pre_steps.name: Fetch or Create Issue
pre_steps.description: Fetch existing issue or create new one. Reads referenced docs and existing commits.
pre_steps.prompt: If work_id provided: fetch issue with fractary-work:issue-fetcher, read all referenced documents and existing commits for context. If no work_id: create issue with fractary-work:issue-creator using the target description.

pre_steps.name: Switch or Create Branch
pre_steps.description: Checkout existing branch or create new one linked to issue
pre_steps.prompt: If issue has associated branch: checkout and fetch it. If new issue or no branch: create branch with fractary-repo:branch-create --work-id. Update git status cache with branch and work ID.

architect.description: Design and plan - extend this phase in child workflows

build.description: Implementation - extend this phase in child workflows

post_steps.name: Commit and Push Changes
post_steps.description: Ensure all build changes are committed and pushed

pre_steps.name: Review Issue Implementation
pre_steps.description: Verify implementation completeness against issue requirements

post_steps.name: Create Pull Request
post_steps.description: Create PR for the implementation (skips if PR already exists). Links to issue for auto-close on merge.

post_steps.name: Review PR CI Checks
post_steps.description: Wait for and review CI/CD pipeline results

post_steps.name: Merge Pull Request
post_steps.description: Merge the PR and delete branch

autonomy.description: Pauses before release for approval - recommended for production
